channel.title: Katzenpost mixnet
channel.description:
Next-gen remailer mixnet in alpha.
Written by Torservers' Moritz Bartl.
Features include: X25519, Noise XX plus NewHope Simple, SURBs, keyservers, reliable out of order delivery.
I hope this gets more attention and a new community of grows around it. There is a live testing network available for volunteers to join. Also an Android app. Hopefully this gets packaged for Debian at some point.
http://www.metzdowd.com/pipermail/cryptography/2018-October/034557.html
https://katzenpost.mixnetworks.org/
